steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bmkk","text":"Prepare loading mixture (6 μl total volume):   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":25,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9tnb8","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a3fih","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"debqd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"al52u","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fd36l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":41,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"be5mp","text":"Dilute only 1 µl of DNA Ladder at a time.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}},"1":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"A_4":{"className":"_dt-italic"}},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":[300,50],"data":[["Distilled water (dH\u003csub\u003e2\u003c/sub\u003e0)* or TE Buffer","4 μl"],["Gel Loading Dye, Purple (6X), no SDS","1 μl"],["DNA Ladder/Marker","1 μl"],["Total Volume","6 μl"]],"guid":"525E0910930711EA9ACF8542B465549B","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":1,"offset":155,"style":"sub"}],"key":"eqqi3","text":"*For multiple loads, dilution, and storage, use TE or other buffer of minimal ionic strength instead of water.
